Package library.model.tasks

package library.model.tasks
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractPeriodicTask
    Just marker of type
    BookingExpireTask
    TimerTask which cancels BOOKED booking after period specified in web.xml time to free the reserved books
    PeriodicTask
    If task needs configuration parameters they should be initialized from web.xml.
    TaskScheduler
    Schedules TimerTasks and keep track of them to be able to cancel them on demand
    UpdateFineTask
    TimerTask which updates user fine in case of non-return books in time
